Class StoredProcedure

  • java.lang.Object
    • StoredProcedure

  • public class StoredProcedure
extends java.lang.Object
    This program demonstrates creating and calling stored procedures and functions. Since the rest of the 3 stored functions is tested in each individual CRUD table, we only present a test on "getUnitPriceFromInventoryRecord" stored function. Note: This file has to be run after running all 5 CRUD tables
    Author:
    Andy
